alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Hardin (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 28 at 5:28PM CDT until July 28 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Hardin County in central Iowa... Southern Franklin County in north central Iowa... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 527 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles south of Coulter, or 10 miles southwest of Hampton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bradford, Hampton Municipal Airport, Iowa Falls and Geneva. This includes Interstate 35 near mile marker 157, and between mile markers 159 and 165. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
